tool_description:
This API uses our custom built database to be able to get Country and City information, it has all the information you could ever need. Search Cities and towns within a country.
Get country and city data. Within country data you have: Capital city, Latitude, Longitude, Continent, Sub region, Population, Calling code, Flag, ISO2, ISO3, Borders, Native name, Basic information, States, Timezones, Currency and Languages. Within the City call you have: Country, City and State.
name: WGD Places
title: WGD Places

api_list.name: Get Country
api_list.description: Get country data using a name or continent

api_list.name: Get City
api_list.description: Gets city information from a country id
